metaTag.name: keywords
metaTag.description: The keywords are the most important words you use on your page.
metaTag.example: SCHURTER, SCHURTER Gruppe, SCHURTER Holding AG, schruter, shurter, shruter

metaTag.name: description
metaTag.description: A description of your website in 3 to 4 sentences
metaTag.example: SCHURTER is a leading innovator, manufacturer and distributor of fuses, connectors, circuit breakers, input systems and EMC products.

metaTag.name: robots
metaTag.description: How far do you allow robots to spider through your website

metaTag.name: revised
metaTag.description: Tells search engine bots the last modified date and time of your webpage

metaTag.name: abstract
metaTag.description: A very short description of the website
metaTag.example: SCHURTER is a leading innovator of electronic parts

metaTag.name: classification
metaTag.description: Tells you what the website is about

metaTag.name: designer
metaTag.description: The meta tag is used to declare the designer of the website

metaTag.name: coverage
metaTag.description: For which part in the world this website was build

metaTag.name: revisit-after
metaTag.description: How often a robot or spider should index your website

metaTag.name: expires
metaTag.description: The expires meta tag defines the expiration date and time of the document being indexed
